amendment.description: Amendment sought to redirect $1 million in funding within the Departmental Operations Office of the Secretary account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 251 (Roll no. 419).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 251 (Roll no. 419).
